attributes.action: Bring back education maintenance allowance (EMA) in England
attributes.additional_details: Please allow this to come back as students deserve to be able to go to the cinema at the weekend, or even to be able to buy their own lunch and travel everyday
attributes.background: EMA was stopped in England in 2010 following cuts from the government, it enables students in further education who's household income is relatively low to £30 a week providing they attend
